website_summaries.verdict: If you have used this popular Maybelline eyeliner in the past, it still offers features that make it worth a try. But there's a chance you may find that it's not as long-wearing or easy to apply as it use to be.
pros: Produced by one of the most recognizable brands in makeup
Has a mechanical dispenser that creates a nice point, no sharpener required
cons: Some long-time users gripe that the formula seems to have changed and doesn't wear as long as it use to
If you push too firmly, the tip may break

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smudge proof squint proof
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my eyes squint a lot, and it's hard to find makeup that doesn't give me a raccoon look. This eyeliner has been on my eyes for 6 hours so far, and I've only had to clean up the under eye once. Trust me, in this Texas heat, that's saying a lot! Also, I work for a high end luxury brand, and this product is very comparable for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great automatically sharpening eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these eyeliners!! Been using these for years!! I was replacing this horrible one I bought at the store — it was some new gel pencil I thought I’d try. Not only did I have to use an actual pencil sharpener for that one, and you had to sharpen it after EVERY use, it was annoying as I’ve been so used to these “automatic” twisting ones. They’re waterproof, and go on smoothly for a nice, clean look! Bonus: it came in a two pack for the same price as you’d buy one at the regular store!! Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.C.

customer_reviews.title: but I really like the application and it wasn't dark enough that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a smidge darker than I expected, but I really like the application and it wasn't dark enough that I didn't like it. It works as well, or better, than higher priced liners I've used in the past. Some liners are made fairly soft so that they slide on smoothly but then because they are so aoft, they smudge, smear and run. That does not happen with this product. I get a perfect straight like that I can blend or leave alone. At such a great price, I'll definitely continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin - TN

customer_reviews.title: What in the world happened?
customer_reviews.text: What changed???? I have bought this liner for years in stores and have been very loyal. These that I purchased do not stay put at all?!?! Baffled as to what changed? Did Maybelline have a bad batch? Or has it been changed? Would really love to know whether to give it another try or if it has been changed; I certainly have to find a new liner! Anyone else had this experience?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUCH.  Too hard for me.
customer_reviews.text: This pencil was soooo darn hard that it actually hurt my eyelid to apply. It was like using a regular lead pencil and you really had to push to get any color. Forget it. I don't know if the one I got was really old or if they are all this way, but I won't be buying another to find out. I threw it out after using on one eye.
customer_reviews.author: Colder

customer_reviews.title: Regarding small insignificant item price
customer_reviews.text: The product works well, I see no reason not to use it
customer_reviews.author: Profiler

customer_reviews.title: Maybelline Makeup Unstoppable Smudge-Proof
customer_reviews.text: I love the Maybelline Makeup Unstoppable Smudge-Proof... I so need this as i cry at Hallmark movies! Abundant Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: Betty McKay

customer_reviews.title: Smudges.
customer_reviews.text: I like how smooth this liner is going on and that the Espresso is pretty bold. However, 100% of the time it smudges and it somehow ends up beneath my lower eyelid. Only happens when I wear this liner. If you're always looking in the mirror to wipe away smudges, go for it. It's nice and bold, goes on smoothly so there are some pro's.
customer_reviews.author: KWalker17

customer_reviews.title: Still need practice.
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to apply, especially if my eyes are dry and want to blink while i'm trying to apply lol. But getting better. Doesn't apply as easily as the other one i have. but work as best as it can.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron-Arienna

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried eyeliner on my upper eyelid (mainly the crayon type but also some liquid ones) but never had any luck with it until I tried this one. It was easy to apply and will definitely be coming back to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Tip breaks off. It is a fake/damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Tip breaks off. It is a fake/damaged product. I LOVE THIS product when it is not fake (I usually buy it from Walmart) but this one is damaged because you just cant apply it, it just keeping breaking off!!!! Damaged!!! It ia the seller not the product. Qhen you buy from other places, this eyeliner is just awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gis

customer_reviews.title: Old Faithful
customer_reviews.text: ETA: the last couple sticks I have received were fakes. The maybelline logo ended with a TM, but on the real ones it's an R. The size is smaller. The consistency is vastly different. I've gone back buying in store bc I can't count on amazon for the real deal. As for the genuine product--I have been using this brand and type since high school--and that was a loooooong time ago! Does not sting at all if a little escapes into your eye, and it's impossible to "wear" off.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth, stays on - looks high end
customer_reviews.text: The worst part of deciding on a new eyeliner is how it works for you. I needed a liner that was going to respond once it hits my lid. I have an aresenal of overpriced, eyeliners that require too much time to actually adhere to my my eyelid (over and and over and over), to get me out the door. Surprisingly, this drugstore gem isn’t one of them. It goes on smooth over eyeshadow and keeps color on for 14+ hours. It doesn’t smudge or flake. I read the reviews and then I purchased. I have a $20, $15 and this liner in my arsenal. It’s that good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Needs time to set, but that's ultimately a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, but I did have some transfer to lower lid when tight lining. You really have to hold your eyes open wide for a minute to give it a chance to set, then it's great. When using this as a liner on top at root of lashes, this is actually a good thing, it gives you time to smudge it for a softer look, if you wish. I use a makeup wipe to remove it, to save my washcloth from getting stained, then use facial wash. Never leave the residue from a wipe on your face. I like it, and will order again, but this will last me a very long time. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crazygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. it works.
customer_reviews.text: As a prep cook, I work 7-8 hrs in a very hot kitchen. This stuff looks good for the first hour but after that it starts breaking down and looks choppy. The end of the day, I look like a raccoon. The only reason I continue to buy it is cause it doesn't make my eyes feel heavy and doesn't cause any issues. Days I don't work, I still need to reapply in a couple hours cause it looks choppy and faded.
customer_reviews.author: KStutz01

customer_reviews.title: This appears fresh, and goes on smoothly. My ...
customer_reviews.text: This appears fresh, and goes on smoothly. My previous experience is that it will tend to dry out and become crumbly. It is a shame that the packaging implies that there is a built-in sharpener (not the case). I have not found any way to restore the point.
customer_reviews.author: Thameena

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you have blue or green eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, really makes blue or green eyes pop! It’s a rich, velvety brown with a hint of wine. Ooooo la la. And it glides on well and stays on well. I’m a good tester for staying power because my eyes are watery all the time and most eyeliner is 90% off by lunch. This was still on when I got home from work!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best!! Perfect in the waterlines!
customer_reviews.text: I am letting my wife write this review: Yaaaaaas!!!! I love this Unstoppable Eyeliner by Maybelline! It’s seriously the best!! I love it as it works wonderfully in the waterlines of your eyes and doesn’t irritate whatsoever. It also doesn’t smudge and lasts all day! It’s easy on the wallet too!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian "SpookYouLaterz" Lubecki

customer_reviews.title: NOT unstoppable
customer_reviews.text: It smudges and smears all over the place and does not last even a few hours. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaLSN

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin/eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Great liner! The only one I use! Wears good all day, except it will smudge a bit if I rub my eyes too hard, but, for normal wear it's great. This is the only eyeliner that doesn't make my eyes itch! I have extremely, extremely sensitive skin and most makeup causes me to itch or turn red, this is the only eyeliner that doesn't make me feel irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Lyons Family

customer_reviews.title: Tip breaks off-useless
customer_reviews.text: The tip likes to break off. So annoying. As it is they don’t put enough liner in it then it breaks? It seemed dry and not to smooth. Maybe I purchased an older expired liner cuz all my others worked well.. just not from this 1st time purchase on Amazon :(
customer_reviews.author: KabRenee

customer_reviews.title: Oh my god...this product has changed in the worst way...
customer_reviews.text: This was my reliable eye pencil...WHAT ON EARTH HAPPENED? Either I acquired a bad, bad, bad duo of these....or, it is just over. This product does not stay....it drips...its awful...I looked like I'd been in a bar fight within 10 minutes of putting it on...bits of it were in my eyes...it never stayed on the inner lid....not even for 2 minutes...oh man...what a drag. Seriously, go elsewhere...DON'T BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: BEST EYE LINER EVER! I've been using this stuff for years. It's dark and gives you a bold look. I always get compliments. It easily stays on all day with out reapplication. I even work a physical job where I am pouring sweat and wiping my eyes every now and then yet at the end of my shift the liner still looks perfect. Plus, This eyeliner isn't that pricey which make it even better. I've tried sooo many kinds of eye liner and this one is the best, It's smooth and blends easily and easy to apply. It also removes nicely using baby/olive oil or a baby wipe!
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: Been using this eyeliner for at least a decade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply soft crayon with intense lasting color that still washes off easily at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn L

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few years, and I gotta say that this is my favorite eyeliner. It never smudges, it stays put all night, and it's super easy to apply. Definitely will be buying it again and again...and again. Tip: I apply a little bit of loose powder on top to make sure it doesn't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Bought it because it was pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i usually like these types of liners and it was pretty cheap and had decent reviews, but I feel like it could definitely be improved. It didn't go on very smooth for me and trying to put it on over my eye shadow was almost impossible, almost no product came off the pencil, and what I could get on smudged quite a bit throughout the day of wearing it, and towards the end of the day when I went to take it off, it seemed like there was almost no product left on my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality. Does not roll on as a solid line and requires pressing extremely hard on your eye lid to even get any product on. I’ve used this eyeliner in the past (however, purchased at store and not from Amazon) and did not have this issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Qualtiy Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality eyeliner. I bought it in pewter which is a soft gray. It doesn't smear and lasts all day. I only apply it to my top lid, so I can't comment on how it perform on the waterline on the lower lid. However, for my uses, it works great. It's easy to apply and doesn't skip. It's also super affordable and has great pigment. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie - MI

customer_reviews.title: Wears off easily and looks rough
customer_reviews.text: It’s inexpensive so I sometimes buy this product when I run out of eyeliner, but I always forget how badly it works. The tip is sharp and soft and is goes on like similar types of eyeliner but lighter. You have to apply at least 2-3 coats and after a few hours it’s unstoppable... at lingering on your bottom lashes and giving that wonderful, “I-just-woke-up-and-I-forgot-to-wash-my-face, look” Spend the extra two bucks and get Revlon ColorStay, there’s even an added sponge tip on the end with a cap that actually stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn J

customer_reviews.title: Good color & works well
customer_reviews.text: Love this pewter color & it works well, with dialing out the color tip as needed. No more broken & wasted parts by trying to sharpen a pencil. I will be ordering more of these!
customer_reviews.author: JMinGHWA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I realize I prefer the pencil verses the liquid. If goes on so smoothly. I sometimes like to just run it across the eyelash line for a perfect causal look or thicker for going out. Love the color and you’re getting two pencils. Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No matter what I do, i can barely get ...
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I do, i can barely get this eyeliner to work. It pulls on my eye lid and barely any will come off. I end up making a mess and irritating my eyes while trying to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It'll last a long time,but it looks like crap when applied.
customer_reviews.text: Boy do you really have to push on this to get the eyeliner affect! A few times the liner down right cracked as I tried to put it on. I resorted to the old fashioned trick of a wuick flick of a lighter to heat it uo fast for added smootheness. Once I got it on,it DID last long,but it looked like crap.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Ran everywhere, weak color even in beginning
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than an hour before it was smeared everywhere, even when using primer. The color, even when first on, was weak as well. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Dried and old not smooth and new.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s the brand or if it’s just been in storage a long time but the eyeliner is kind of hard. It does not go on smoothly at all I have to press down hard just to get a smudge, and It’s really hard to get a thin line because of how hard or dried it is. Very unhappy with purchase and found out how bad it is far too late to return eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw away after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to eyeliner for a long time, but buying it on Amazon was a mistake. Used it twice, and each time it broke in the middle of me using it. The second time, it broke and when I tried to twist up to continue using, it was stuck. I ended up throwing it away after 2 uses and buying a new one from CVS :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt smudge at all
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay liner, it was not as black as i wanted. But the good thing about it is that it never smudges. So i can put it on my water line too. Its hard to draw a wing liner with it because it doesnt stay as pointed after using it for one time. The application isnt too smooth as well but i think smooth eyeliners tend to smudge faster too.
customer_reviews.author: Saliha

customer_reviews.title: It still smudges
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect and it glides on easily.... but it smudges! If you’re going out to dinner or a movie it’ll be ok but if you do any dancing or working out a bit or at an outdoor cafe in Florida then it’ll smudge for sure
customer_reviews.author: Kirameister

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for YEARS.....
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market for people wanting long life on a eye liner. Although seems to not stay on quite as long as a year ago,but could be me with allergys. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Morris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty okay.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't found a true "smudge proof" or "waterproof" liner yet that doesn't feel like glue. This one feels alright on your skin, but it's not as "everything proof" as you'd hope. The color is nice and dark, and I like that I don't have to use a sharpener of any kind. Overall it's good, not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I FIND THIS TO BE VERY NICE, GLIDES ON SMOOTH, NO SMUDGING THROUGHOUT THE DAY AND IT LAST. THE ONLY REASON I DIDNT GIVE IT ALL THE STARS IS BECAUSE I DONT LIKE THE FACT THAT YOU CANT SEE JUST HOW MUCH OF A STICK YOU HAVE, AND IT RUNS OUT QUICK.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Safari tested
customer_reviews.text: Wore this in the jungles of Africa, and it legit wouldn't smudge all day. Sometimes it would be a little worn off by the end of the day, but it never gave me raccoon eyes. Great for my sensitive/allergy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Belle

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love these eyeliners. Purchased originally in the department store and I fell in love with the wear, the application and how long one pencil lasts. My local store was sold out for weeks so I finally looked on amazon and found the 2 pack for the price I paid for 1 in the store! Talk about value! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't think I would like it but I do
customer_reviews.text: Much more of a blue/green peacock type color on me which I was pleasantly surprised by. I wouldn't think I would like it but I do. I mix it with an eggplant eyeliner color and the result it a pretty color. It does irritate my eyes, but most eye cosmetics do. I'm still glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Petit Trianon

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING!
customer_reviews.text: The package says "all day wear, smudge resistant." Maybe for some, but definitely not for me, and I even applied eyelid primer beforehand!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lessman

customer_reviews.title: It smears
customer_reviews.text: The product stays on but I find that it smudges quite a bit. I was cleaning raccoon eyes every couple of hours after putting it on. The color is good and deep and lasted a long time...maybe a little too long. I washed my face and eyes twice after wearing it and woke up with raccoon eyes the next morning anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Ya know, eyeliner was just eyeliner all my life and I never noticed much difference. I prefer the fat crayon type that are out of style so this is good enough. Tried another brand and it was softer and easier to apply. Maybelline is okay. It works but it's not easiest to use.
customer_reviews.author: t anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: The product itself isn’t bad. The color was just what I was looking for; however, when I first opened it, the eyeliner was already falling out of the tip of the pen. It’s cheap so whatever but wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I buy this ALL the time
customer_reviews.text: By far my most favorite eye liner. It does smudge over the course if the day but it goes on smoother than regular eye liner pencils and is far easier to use than a liquid. I have bought this product many many many times and the blue eye liner is amazing for making people with blue eyes stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Wast of money
customer_reviews.text: This product came very dry and did not apply smoothly. I’ve been using this brand for years and love it but this one was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner.... Black is too harsh for my complexion so I buy the espresso which is a really dark brown, almost black but not quite as strong. I can't even find this color in the store anymore. This is the second time I have ordered this product and I will continue to do so. It goes on easily and is pretty smudge proof. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dian Black

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The liner is dried out , this makes it hard to slide over the eye lid. I have to stretch the skin and push way harder then store bought brand. It’s hard to make a clean line. And it smudges Sometimes deals do not pan out this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiann

customer_reviews.title: very dry- tip breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to put on neatly. It almost scratches one's eyelid and breaks easily. The price was low. I should have known better. The quality was also low. Who cares if a product is smudge-proof, long-wearing, or water resistant if one cannot put the product on? I did try putting a bit of cream on the tip so the pencil would glide more easily, and it helped a tiny bit; but the tip broke off anyway...time after time. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Decent eyeliner for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite eyeliner but good for the price! I like that it washes off easy with soap and water. Cons: doesn’t glide/slide on as easy, fades throughout the day, and not as dark/black as I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT EYELINER
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for YEARS! I find it to be the best eyeliner as it goes on smooth and doesn't smudge. Very easy to apply and it glides on.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi b

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Clinique quickliner. Six stars!
customer_reviews.text: I decided try this product and I was amazed. It is the besy eyeliner i ever used. Easy to apply. Stays forever even if you sleep all night with it. Besides , it costs four times less than Clinique quickliner that by the eay, is tested in animals.
customer_reviews.author: Eloiza Clay

customer_reviews.title: Works ok in waterline.
customer_reviews.text: They work ok. I use them on my waterline and it's a little hard to get the color pay off. I have to go over the same spot a couple times to get the color I want. But they last well and don't smuge. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite liner. My eye tears terrible & most days this longer stays put.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Bleh
customer_reviews.text: Not so great. Smudges easily and color is more charcoal gray.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Black Eyeliner Lovers Rejoice! This Liner is a Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a gel eyeliner but my hands have trembled since I was a young teen since Im very anxiety prone and it permeates everything from events to movements so I got this as I can hold it steadier and get an easier line. I love this product, I think its the second time I've bought it from here and once from Walmart. It stays on all day or until I take a nap and rub my face all over the pillow. I adore coal eyes and this helps meet that end. Doesn't go on choppy, very smooth, WILL rub off if you rub at it a lot but it stays on if you don't TRY to ruin it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not really smudgeproof or long wearin if used on water-line
customer_reviews.text: Although this pencil is not really water resistant or smudge proof when used on the water-line, it is still the best pencil I've found. The pencil is soft so it glides on easily without having to rub hard.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Old
customer_reviews.text: It was dried up. I think I got an old pack because I usually love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Changy

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't apply easy. It's not at all water proof. I like intense black and this looks more brown, no matter how many times you go over it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Stays put. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying this pencil eyeliner because I'm tired of drawing on liquid eyeliner just to have it transfer to my upper and lower eyelids. It is much easier to apply and the brown is a welcome change from the black eyeliner everyone is wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: This eyeliner stays on att day and doesn't smudge. ...
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner stays on att day and doesn't smudge. I'm a nurse and some days I'm sweating trying to run to all my patient's rooms but this eyeliner doesn't quit. And it's affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jeanloz

customer_reviews.title: My fave!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner. Yes it does bleed a little throughout the day but it really does a great job and I have tried A LOT of different kinds. And I love the sapphire color!
customer_reviews.author: modustee

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner great for guys new to the art of makeup.
customer_reviews.text: A great eyeliner for trouble-less application. When used, the deep black color stays on for the whole day. Since Maybeline Unstoppable Eyeliner avoids any smuggles around one’s eyes, I would recommend Maybeline Unstoppable Eyeliner for other guys, especially if you are new to an eyeliner use. Needless to say, it is inexpensive & effective, application lasts for a whole day and the eyeliner in a form of a pen lasts for many applications. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luke T

customer_reviews.title: Came off in a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Came off super fast. Burns my eyes. I probably shouldn't have wore it to bed but let's face it we all do. I woke up with a tiny bump in my eye. Took a while to go away. Will not buy again. I've never had that happen in my life.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but it doesn't last as long as it stated. It doesn't glide on as easily as I would have thought it would. But it's useable. I'm looking for another brand at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Better than many eyeliners, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner looks good, but does not last as well as Revlon's Colorstay liquid eye pen. Maybelline has been the best company over the years for mascara, but Revlon has them beat for the eyeliner at this point.
customer_reviews.author: FL-MSW

customer_reviews.title: Great liner pencil.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite eye liner pencils. Goes on easily without pulling, and stays put all day long. Love the automatic mechanical pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne

customer_reviews.title: Worked well while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well while it lasted but the packaging from the manufacturer was so child proof that I ended up crimping the pencil when I opened it. The coloring portion ended breaking and the product was unusable No fault of delivery but the packaging from manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Treeshrub

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a great deal. I was able to wipe off easy when I messed up. I've gone to sleep 2 nights with it on and it's still on and it hasn't smudged. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard, not too soft, stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the hard eyebrow pencil and do my little trick of warming/softening the tip with a lighter or my blowdryer. This allowed the pencil to glide without hurting. But I get the same effect using this pencil without the added step. in fact, it works so easily and quickly (since I don't have to use tricks), I keep it in my car and just put on my eyeliner in 1 minute before I start my car. I only need to touch it up if I've been rubbing my eyes a lot, which is the same for any make-up, really. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalBuyer

customer_reviews.title: I like this. It's a deep black pencil
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It's a deep black pencil, and it lasts months, even if you use it every day. The only downside is Maybelline doesn't make the lead long enough if it snaps off. I have sensitive eyes, so it causes irritation. It may be different for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm old school and live using pencil eyeliner but I also like the convenience of not having to sharpen my pencil for good lines. This eyeliner goes on smooth and easy. It's stays on for the entire days and doesn't smudge. Great but!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Dicken

customer_reviews.title: No raccoon eyes for me!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, an eyeliner that truly does not smudge and melt all over your face! I have always liked this eyeliner but lately, I find it has improved. Even riding on the back of my fiance’s Bike, my eyeliner does not melt, run or disappear when I use this, even in July or August! It removes easily with eye make up remover.
customer_reviews.author: Little D

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Eyeliner came melted and damaged beyond use. Not expensive but was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sapphire is lighter and smudgy
customer_reviews.text: Far more smudgy then I wanted. The shade sapphire is a lighter blue than I expected. However just because it wasn’t what I expected doesn’t make it bad eyeliner.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is a nice color nice and thin but it was very difficult to remove the plastic even with an exact knife I’m using it but the plastic is still on there.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne wasylink

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of these were defective. I’ve been using this liner for years and would get a defective one maybe every few years but for all 3 of these in one order to be defective was an annoying waste of money. The liner wouldn’t scroll out and when I took it apart to find out why it was literally dried up.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Stays on even in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come off even when going to an indoor pool party. Great bold color and long stay power. Easy to remove with wipes or micellar water when you're ready tho
customer_reviews.author: Angel Judkins

customer_reviews.title: It's my favorite eyeliner. And the color is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this for years. It's my favorite eyeliner. And the color is perfect for me. When eyeliner is too dark I find it distracting. This is more like enhancing your natural color. Smooth to apply.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner stick
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eye liner I purchase. I love it. Ive ordered here several times, they arrive fast and ive never recieved them broken, always full sticks. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Heather Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner color! Goes on smooth, lasts all day. Does smear a little if sweating or if you’re in any rain/water. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EWS10

customer_reviews.title: so I purchase from amazon with good price. Long last and quick & easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I been using it for many month. I often brought it from Walmart or Target, but lately I got no time, so I purchase from amazon with good price. Long last and quick & easy to apply for an eyeliner. doesn't smear, but i often put liquid eyeliner on top just to make sure that i will not smear.. i applied just once a day at upper at lower eyelids before going to work, and it last all day. very intense dark black, which I love ^^
customer_reviews.author: V.V.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I've EVER had! I have pretty oily skin and I usually have to wipe my eyeliner from under my eyes throughout the day. This one stays right where I put it until I'm ready for it to come off! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: It is not at smooth and I had to hurt my eyes to even get a thin stroke of liner on my eyes. I selected the pewter color and it is nothing similar to black. It is better to wear no eye makeup than this stupid kajal.
customer_reviews.author: Jomy

customer_reviews.title: Swivel mechanism not working
customer_reviews.text: I received this product however when I tried to swivel it in order to bring the tip out so I can use it, the swivel seems to be broken as I keep trying to twist and it's just not working. Very frustrated as I bought makeup online for first time and realize the value of just getting down to the store. ' I would add a photo but there's no point because you need a video to prove that the thing doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: This Maybelline Eyeliner IS Unstoppable
customer_reviews.text: I adore this eyeliner! It lasts for like 3 months and the color looks great for my dark eyes. I love the precise point of the liner and how it does not break easily. Definitely one of the best eyeliners I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Marlynne Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It was really good for the price. However, it didn't stay all day, but it didn't run. It just dissipated into thin air.
customer_reviews.author: Cha'kwaina

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Totally surprised! This is great! Don’t know why I’d spend another dime on high end eyeliner! Bought this when I was traveling because I left my expensive one at home. Way to go Maybelline!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the amount
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it’s really dried up and is hard and doesn’t work well. Otherwise, if it’s not dried up, it’s works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite eyeliner! I have tried many but I am never disappointed what does product. The color goes well with my brown eyes.
customer_reviews.author: J Mc

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It's not pricey and it works very well. Smooth going on and lasts a long time for not being waterproof. I don't use a lot of make up but this does exactly what it says it does
customer_reviews.author: Judy Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I use eye primer (above and below my eyes) with this product... But I use eye primer with all the different kinds of eyeliners I use... This stays put the best!
customer_reviews.author: Momdust

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but I don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. For the price, it gets the job done without making you look like a streetwalker. However, by the end of the day (actually, more like hours later), the product melts off regardless of the weather. Seriously. You could be in the frozen depths of Hell... This product is going to melt off somehow. I keep buying it because it's cheap and goes on smoothly without smudging too horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dufault

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper in pairs
customer_reviews.text: This truely bring out the color of my eyes. Not really it is for my wife. Buy 2 on amazon for the price of one at the store
customer_reviews.author: KindleJason  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, easy to apply. Only thing i don't like is the first time i tried this, a bit of it chunked off like crayon and got stuck in my eyelashes. That was decently annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hurley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite pencil eyeliner of all time. If I want to get a little fancier I will follow up with a black liquid liner.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

product_meta.title: Maybelline Unstoppable Eyeliner, Onyx, 0.01 oz.
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Count| Color:10 ONYXSport a perfect cat-eyed look all day and experience the long-lasting wear of Maybelline New York’s Unstoppable Eyeliner. The mechanical pencil eyeliner features a self-sharpening tool allowing you yo always have a sharp point, from natural to bold definition. You are now unstoppable as it delivers color that stays true all day! The waterproof and smudge resistant formula has been ophthalmologist tested and is suitable for both sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. Available in 5 super-saturated shades: Onyx, Cinnabar, Pewter, Sapphire and Espresso.

BRAND STORY
By Maybelline
feature_bullets: SMUDGE RESISTANT PENCIL EYELINER: With a self-sharpening tip & a smudge-resistant, waterproof formula, this mechanical eye pencil delivers control and definition from natural lines to your boldest looks.

DEFINE YOUR EYE: No eye look is complete without Maybelline Eyeliner--amp up the drama with a black eyeliner pen, get playful with a green or blue eye liner, or take a softer approach with brown eyeliner. Remove waterproof eyeliner with a makeup remover.

MAYBELLINE IS THE EYE EXPERT: Whatever your signature eye look, whether natural or dramatic, Maybelline helps create looks that draw eyes. With a broad selection of pencil & liquid eyeliners, highly pigmented eyeshadows, iconic mascara, & eyebrow makeup.

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.
